Service Details: - Mobilizing the church to find practical ways to assist individuals whose lives have been impacted by crime to become whole and productive members of the community - Offers social, emotional and spiritual support and counselling to adult offenders and their families, during incarceration, pre and post-release - Offers prison visits, chapel services & penpal correspondence - Weekly drop in offering computer & telephone use, help getting ID, free store, recreational activities, 12 step programs and safe housing - Provides referrals to other community agencies for employment, transitional housing and basic needs
How to Apply: Must be involved with the criminal justice system at time of registering
Meetings: Please visit our website for details on upcoming events
Address & Map: 1197 Sutherland AveKelowna, BC     V1Y 5Y2View MapQuest Map
Print Material: Mentor's Manual; Pen Pal Manual; Room & Board Manual; Policy & Procedures Manual; Abuse Prevention Manual; 12 Step Manual; Aftercare Activity Tracking Software. Contact us if interested in any of above!
